"#How to make Amla hair oil at home?"
"1. Grate the Amla first and discard the pit. If you like you can use a blender"
"2. Squeeze out the Amla juice. Add coconut oil to it and whip it together for 4-5 minutes."
"3. Place the whipped oil in hot water until it goes liquid. Your freshly made Amla oil is ready."
Mouth ulcers are very painful. Even you cannot take a sip of water. The improper digestion, stomach infections, intake of Paan are the major reasons behind happening of mouth ulcers.
Some homemade remedies to get rid of mouth ulcers --
1. You can apply glycerin on the ulcers. This helps in reducing dryness and pain. It hydrates your skin.
2. Allowing ice chips to melt over the ulcers or rinsing your mouth with salt water or baking soda and water may help to lessen pain.
3. Avoiding spicy, acidic and abrasive foods may also help.
4. You can apply Ghee over the ulcer which helps in softening of skin all around the ulcer and then consume coconut will also help.
5. You can even consume three to four leaves of Mogra tree, can also help.
1. How to make Almond whitening cream at home by just using simple two-three ingredients??

Almond is very rich in vitamin E which protects your skin from UV rays. Almond makes skin soft, smooth and glowing. Almond also consists of vitamin-A which helps to reduce Acne. Alovera consists of Anti-oxidants and its rich with vitamins, which nourishes our Skin and keep it moisturized
1. For making Almond Cream take some 10-15 almonds and soak it in water for overnight. Remove its skin.
2. Take all those almonds and add some rose water and grind it well with the help of grinder.

3. Now strain it well with the help of strainer. Now take this Almond milk in a bowl and add two tablespoon of Alovera gel, 2 tablespoon of Coconut oil and mix it well. Now, your homemade Almond cream is completely ready to use.
